price: Le dijeron: "¡Oh, Abraham! ¿Fuiste tú quien destruyó nuestros dioses?"
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
